summary: A unit‑test module that exercises the jitter buffer component, checking its handling of ordered and out‑of‑order RTP packets, sequence number gaps, overflow discarding, buffer resets, removal of audio/video frames and picture‑loss indication processing.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the jitter buffer used in real‑time media streaming, ensuring proper packet ordering, loss handling and state management before deployment.
